name: Pro License Subscription
detailed_description:
Gravity Sketch is an immersive 3D creation tool. You can create detailed professional grade 3D models, scenes, and artwork in a fast, intuitive way! From idea conception, design directly in 3D and take your models out of the scene into another design tool, CAD software, game engine, or 3D print platform. Upload your creations directly from the app to the cloud and share with others in a matter of seconds. Gravity Sketch will change your design workflow and the way you share 3D content.

Pro Subscription Features:

- All geometry creation tools
- Import .obj
- Export as .obj .fbx .iges
- Upload to the cloud
- 12 Layers
- Control point snapping
- 4 environments

For yearly subscription contact us directly info@graitysketch.com
The Pro license is for Freelancers/Educators.
*Commercial use limitations: If your company earns over $10,000/yr from work involving Gravity Sketch you are a pro user

short_description: Gravity Sketch is an immersive 3D creation tool. You can create detailed professional grade 3D models, scenes, and artwork in a fast, intuitive way!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7 SP1 or newer.
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 4590 or AMD FX 8350 or greater.
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 970 or AMD Radeon R9 290 or better
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: macOS High Sierra
  • Processor: 3GHz 4 Core CPU
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Vega 56
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
